title: Webhooks
subtext: Webhooks enable real-time communication between applications, simplifying event-driven integrations and enhancing user experiences.
author: Rilwan

description.title: Webhooks
texts: A webhook is an API endpoint e.g '/new-sales' used to recive event-triggered messages from another another web server.
An example event includes the following: new sales from a product, new subscription, failed payments, new follower, etc.
A webhook is responsible for receiving and processing incoming data.

For instance, with Gumroad API, you can get notified on new sales from your digital products. This notification is usually sent to a webhook endpoint(or API endpoint) within your web application. Therefore, the webhook endpoint serves as a watchman for receiving these ntoifications for use within your app.
This is useful if you are building an application for Gumroad creators/store owners. With webhooks, you can notify users of new events in their store.
